mapper.select: SELECT d.accomodation_detail_code , c.accomodation_category_name , r.region_name , m.id , m.company_name , d.check_inout , d.parking , d.registration_datetime , o.room_price FROM accomodation_detail AS d INNER JOIN accomodation_category AS c ON d.accomodation_category_code = c.accomodation_category_code INNER JOIN region AS r on r.region_code = d.region_code INNER JOIN company_member AS m ON m.company_member_code = d.company_member_code INNER JOIN goods_accomodation_option AS o ON o.accomodation_detail_code = d.accomodation_detail_code;
mapper.insert:
SELECT (CASE -- 상품이 없을 경우 WHEN count(g.accomodation_detail_code) = 0 THEN 'adc001' -- 999개 등록되어 있을 경우 WHEN (Max(CAST(substring_index(g.accomodation_detail_code,'g',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) > 999 THEN concat('adc',Max(CAST(substring_index(g.accomodation_detail_code,'adc',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) -- 1~999 범위일 경우 ELSE concat('adc',LPAD(Max(CAST(substring_index(g.accomodation_detail_code,'adc',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1,3,0)) END) AS accommodationDetailCode FROM accomodation_detail AS g;
INSERT INTO accomodation_detail (accomodation_detail_code , accomodation_category_code , region_code , company_member_code , id , check_inout , parking , registration_datetime) VALUES (#{accommodationDetailCode} ,#{accommodationCategoryCode} ,#{accommodationRegionCode} ,'cmc001' ,'id003' ,#{checkInOut} ,#{parking} ,now())
